title: 820-2879-b bad ram slot
message:
One ram slot went bad, not the bga one but the trough hole. Measured every contact pin for discontinuity but it seems fine. Is there any way to fix this issue or forget it and just use the good slot?
Thanks

title: 820-2879-b bad ram slot
message: Forget it, just use the good slot. You'll waste time and still have a bad slot, and likely 2 if you aren't extremely careful. Don't push your luck, especially on an older board anyway.
